# GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipAppStoreReviewDetail | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipAppStoreReviewDetail 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipAppStoreReviewDetail

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipAppStoreReviewDetail#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipAppStoreReviewDetail
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipAppStoreReviewDetail#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipAppStoreReviewDetail#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppClipDefaultExperienceAppClipAppStoreReviewDetailLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appclipdefaultexperienceappclipappstorereviewdetaillinkageresponse)`OK`

### [Getting Default App Clip Experience Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipAppStoreReviewDetail#Getting-Default-App-Clip-Experience-Information)

[`Read Default App Clip Experience Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_)Get a specific default App Clip experience.[`Read the App Store Review Detail for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-appclipappstorereviewdetail)Get App Store Review details for a specific default App Clip experience.[`Read Localization Information for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-appclipdefaultexperiencelocalizations)Get localized metadata that appears on the App Clip card for a specific default App Clip experience.[`GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-relationships-appclipdefaultexperiencelocalizations)[`Read App Store Version Information for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-releasewithappstoreversion)Get App Store Version information for a default App Clip experience.[`Get the App Store Versions Resource ID for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-relationships-releasewithappstoreversion)Get IDs for App Store Versions related to a default App Clip experience.
